name: THE BLACK DAY
description:
BLACK DAY IS A MULTIPLAYER FPS GAME WITH AMAZING GRAPHICS QUALITY 

with 3 different types of modes

TEAM DEATHMATCH

FREE FOR ALL

CAPTURE THE FLAG

HOST GAME , PLAY WITH YOUR FREINDS

this game is in its early access stage . and have few bugs . you can also support us by donating us and it will be used for our server and  further devlopment thank you ;D , hope you enjoy the game

STEPS TO INSTALL ;

its very simple to install our game 

  • first of all unzip the .rar
  • then open black day folder 
  • then click on black day.exe
  • enjoy !
